Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.BackgroundTasks.Models.BlockingBackgroundTaskWorker Class Reference Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.BackgroundTasks.Models.BlockingBackgroundTaskWorker
The BlockingBackgroundTaskWorker should be assumed to never be immediately available, that one always will wait in a queue for a user-noticeable amount of time.

Detailed Description
The BlockingBackgroundTaskWorker should be assumed to never be immediately available, that one always will wait in a queue for a user-noticeable amount of time.
